document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Firmament </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">cordial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">miracle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Pompless no life can pass away
